name: Dine In Devil
description:
EARLY TESTING
You've been hired to work at Dine-In-Devil where you cook foods and slay demons! What a treat!
You need to serve customers by cooking, you need resources by killing demons
Controls :
W,A,S,D = Movement
Left_Mouse_Click = Shoot
Right_Mouse_Click = Melee (Always kill enemies with melee, if you want to harvest resources)
R = Reload
E = Interact
ESC = Main Menu
Shift = Dash
There's a room where you can heal though it may cost some time.This is game is still in progress, please expect some bugs
